ISSUE.TITLE: Customize GitHub Status Message (1.0)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When we abstracted the go-scm library we made it more difficult to customize the status message, which is why it is currently disabled in the latest release candidate. I think we can satisfy customization and support for all providers by exposing this as a generic template string: ``` continuous-integration/drone/{{ if .Build.Event eq "pull_request" }}pr{{ else }}push{{ end }} ```
